title: Authors and Citation
text: Matthew Young. Author. Nadia Davidson. Author. Federico Marini. Contributor, maintainer.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Young M, Davidson N (2024). geneLenDataBase: Lengths mRNA transcripts number genomes. R package version 1.41.2, https://github.com/federicomarini/geneLenDataBase.
code: @Manual{,   title = {geneLenDataBase: Lengths of mRNA transcripts for a number of genomes},   author = {Matthew Young and Nadia Davidson},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 1.41.2},   url = {https://github.com/federicomarini/geneLenDataBase}, }

what: Lengths of mRNA transcripts for a number of genomes
title: Lengths of mRNA transcripts for a number of genomes
text: geneLenDataBase package provides information length mRNA transcripts number genomes gene ID formats, largely based UCSC table browser. Data objects provided individual pieces information retrieved loaded. variety different gene identifiers genomes supported ensure wide applicability. geneLenDataBase can found Bioconductor (https://www.bioconductor.org/packages/geneLenDataBase).

title: Lengths of mRNA transcripts for a number of genomes
text: can install version geneLenDataBase Bioconductor commands: Alternatively, can install development version geneLenDataBase GitHub :
code: if (!require("BiocManager")) {   install.packages("BiocManager") } BiocManager::install("geneLenDataBase") library("remotes") remotes::install_github("federicomarini/geneLenDataBase")

what: Transcript length data for the organism anoCar — anoCar1.ensGene.LENGTH
title: Transcript length data for the organism anoCar — anoCar1.ensGene.LENGTH
text: anoCar1.ensGene.LENGTH R object maps transcripts length (bp) mature mRNA transcripts.  available, also provide mapping gene ID associated transcripts.  data obtained UCSC table browser (http://genome.ucsc.edu/cgi-bin/hgTables) using ensGene table. data file made calling downloadLengthFromUCSC(anoCar1, ensGene) date package last updated.

title: Supported Gene IDs — supportedGeneIDs
text: Lists supported gene ID formats

title: Supported Gene IDs — supportedGeneIDs
code: supportedGeneIDs()

title: Supported Gene IDs — supportedGeneIDs
text: data.frame containing supported gene ID formats.

title: Supported Gene IDs — supportedGeneIDs
text: Uses supportedUCSCtables function GenomicFeatures package obtain list gene ID formats available UCSC genome browser.  db column gives gene ID formats provided id arguement various functions.  track subtrack columns names UCSC track/subtrack information fetched. GeneID column lists "full name" gene ID format available. final column, headed AvailableGenomes lists genomes local copy length information avaible gene ID format listed geneLenDataBase package.

title: Purge factors — unfactor
text: factors type, remove factors must convert level another type.  currently done using "typeless" behaviour: factor converted numeric vector can done without inducing NAs, otherwise coerced using .character. Currently supported types : factor, data.frame list.

text: xenTro2.ensGene.LENGTH R object maps transcripts length (bp) mature mRNA transcripts.  available, also provide mapping gene ID associated transcripts.  data obtained UCSC table browser (http://genome.ucsc.edu/cgi-bin/hgTables) using ensGene table. data file made calling downloadLengthFromUCSC(xenTro2, ensGene) date package last updated.
